law.catch_line: Annual evaluation -- Renewal or continuation of programs.
law.text: The commission shall evaluate each community corrections program on an annual basis to determine the degree to which the program has accomplished the goals set forth in KRS 196.702(4). The commission shall not renew or continue a program that has failed to accomplish those goals and that shows no promise of doing so in the future, after allowing for changes in the number of convictions.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 6, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992.
